## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [16S Microbial analysis with Nanopore data](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/microbiome/tutorials/nanopore-16S-metagenomics/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
